verse.roman:
asmākaṁ ca mahān artho
hy etenaiva bhaviṣyati
yaśaś ca tava govinda
rājño baddhān vimuñcataḥ

synonyms: asmākam—for us; ca—and; mahān—great; arthaḥ—a gain; hi—indeed; etena—by this; eva—even; bhaviṣyati—there will be; yaśaḥ—glory; ca—and; tava—for You; govinda—O Govinda; rājñaḥ—the kings; baddhān—imprisoned; vimuñcataḥ—who will release.
translation: By this decision there will be great gain for us, and You will save the kings. Thus, Govinda, You will be glorified.
